projectDesc.p: The project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_idListMembers_v01.xml file.

div.p:
suga ramani dunuṁ, tuha banuA si timvun· ramani camyuk·, variga si duruṁ, parujar· si vuntu ramani səsək·, muAṁ dharaṇa ramani palaku, vineḥ vḍihan· yu 1 pirak· mā 2 sovaṁ-sovaṁ, reṇa māgman· gusti si skar· re sarutī, vinkas·‚ si bha
vi re duduṁ, variga si ruti vineḥ ken· vlaḥ 1 pirak· mā 2 sovaṁ-sovaṁ reṇa matuha si sukha re maṅinaki tuha banuA si L̥ṅkap· re camyak· vineḥ ken vlaḥ 1 pirak· mā 2 sovaṁ-sovaṁ, paraujar· si tamvam· re səsək·, mu
Aṁ si ramyā re luhik· vineḥ ken· vlaḥ 1 pirak· mā 4 sovaṁ reṇa maratā prāṇa 52 vineḥ pirak· mā 2 sovaṁ-sovaṁ,

pinakānak· Anakvi prāṇa 15 vineḥ pirak· mā 1 sovaṁ-sovaṁ, rarai prāṇa 19 vineḥ pirak·
ku 1 sovaṁ rāma māgman· Iṁ vulusan· gusti si ṅeṅe ramani drabya, vinkas· si puñjaṁ ramani tīn· variga si malaḥ ramani tatəl· muAṁ si nala rama tasər·, parujar· si sudhana ramani jaya, huler· si glis· ramani gunuṁ ma
kava prāṇa 4 si Amvil· ramani vakul·, muAṁ si piṅul· ramani gadā si galuḥ ramani kpal·, si gamī ramani garamman· vineḥ vḍihan· yu 1 pirak· mā 2 sovaṁ-sovaṁ

tuha banuA si grya ramani bloṇḍo vineḥ vḍihan· yu 1 pirak·
mā 2 rāma maratā mapaṅaliḥ prāṇa 24 vineḥ pirak· mā 2 sovaṁ-sovaṁ, masahlayan· prāṇa 34 vineḥ pirak· mā 1 sovaṁ-sovaṁ, reṇa māgman· gusti si vaku re drabya, vinkas· si jaya re vrayan·, huler· si tira re cu
mel·, variga si hadyan· re lalu, muAṁ si buṁsut· re tatəl·, makava prāṇa 4 si kə:n· re kurusut·, muAṁ si kuṇḍa re kvuAn· si talaga re do, si tnə: re gaṇa vineḥ ken· vlaḥ 1 pirak· mā 2 sovaṁ-sovaṁ,

tuha ba
nuA si gnaḥ re tablā vineḥ ken· vlaḥ 1 pirak· mā 2 valyan· si piṅgān· vineḥ pirak· mā 2 reṇa maratā prāṇa 25 vineḥ pirak· mā 1 sovaṁ-sovaṁ,

rāma tpi siriṁ I liṅo kalima si kumāra I vuhəl· kalaṁ si tamvi
s·, gusti si tika, Iṁ dmak· gusti si kamvaṁ, I sipakər· kalaṁ si pañcama, parujar· si kula muAṁ si mattha, I laṅit aji gusti si buAḥ vinkas· si garbhī vineḥ pirak· mā 2 sovaṁ-sovaṁ, tuha paḍahi prāṇa 20 vineḥ pirak·
mā 1 sovaṁ-sovaṁ, mūla pañjut· prāṇa 6 vineḥ pirak· mā 2 sovaṁ-sovaṁ, mūla cuṇḍa vineḥ pirak· mā 1 mabañol· si muñut· muAṁ si biluṁluṁ, si kdəṁ, Avayaṁ si maṅgulai, muAṁ si paṇḍita vineḥ pirak· mā
4 sovaṁ-sovaṁ, kalulanya maṅabaihi pirak· mā 4 manuvuṁ si dhavala ramani kr̥ṣṇa, muAṁ si dhanuka ramani garantuṅan· vineḥ vḍihan· yu 1 pirak· mā 4 sovaṁ, maroṇḍon· maṅabaihi pirak· mā 8 maṅla maṅabaihi
pirak· mā 1 mabyāpāra vahuta vuluṁ jalan· muAṁ raṅgi, pirak· mā 1 sovaṁ, tuluṁ tutumadāṁ prāṇa 31 vineḥ pirak· ku 1 sovaṁ-sovaṁ magaṇḍiṁ I samgat· Aṅinn-aṅin· prāṇa 2 vineḥ pirak· mā 1 ku 2
See our preamble to the Taji charter for a discussion of similarities and differences to this inscription.
Intially read by Arlo Griffiths from photographs furnished by Jérôme Samuel. Reverified on 2019-11-20 at François Mandeville's residence.
